item.title: Report X-2024101411
item.description:
Report X-2024101411

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-24T09:29:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-14
  • City: MAPLE GROVE
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A HZAMAT AUDITOR CAME BY THE DMP SAYING A HAZMAT ON HIS TRAM WAS LEAKING. ON THE TRAM RESPONDER SAW A HAZMAT PACKAGE WITH BOTH CLASS 5.1 AND 8 DIAMOND HAZARD LABELS WITH A SMALL AMOUNT OF LIQUID LEAKING FROM A CORNER ON THE PACKAGE. INSPECTING THE INNER CONTENTS AT THE DMP RESPONDER FOUND 4 1GAL CONTAINERS WITH 1 OF THE CONTAINERS HAVING A CAP THAT WAS ON CROOKED ALLOWING SOME OF THE CONTENTS TO LEAK.
